title: 2024 review: Stunning JWST images that reveal the beauty of space
description: In 2024 the James Webb Space Telescope released stunning new images of the beauty of space, here are the best
excerpt: In 2024 the James Webb Space Telescope released stunning new images of the beauty of space, here are the best
text: In its short existence, the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) has transformed our understanding of the universe. It has peered at planets, stars, galaxies and black holes, casting its eye over a cornucopia of celestial treats. It can seem like JWST arrived out of nowhere, but the telescope has been the collective effort of tens of thousands of scientists over decades. Here are some of this year’s best new images. Read more: 10 stunning James Webb Space Telescope images show the beauty of space Topics:
html:
In its short existence, the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) has transformed our understanding of the universe. It has peered at planets, stars, galaxies and black holes, casting its eye over a cornucopia of celestial treats. It can seem like JWST arrived out of nowhere, but the telescope has been the collective effort of tens of thousands of scientists over decades. Here are some of this year’s best new images.

Read more: 10 stunning James Webb Space Telescope images show the beauty of space
